page.title: 16A Greatworth pupil's day
page.content: This morning I got up at 8.15,had a wash and brushed my teeth.I had orange juice and sugar puffs for breakfast.I arrived at school at 8.50.We had registration followed by assembly.Our school work was cented around the Domesday Project.We had lunch at 12.00 o'clock.We had chunks of meat, potatoes,cabbage and gravy. We had a biscuit for afters. In the afternoon I used paint and pastels to draw some of my ideas.We also played rounders.We went home at 3.45pm and I went to my friends for tea.I helped wash up and put away. In the evening I took my dog for a walk and tidied my bedroom.I went to bed about 8.30pm. This is an example of the life style of one pupil at Greatworth School during one day.
